main event: Officers from the Seventh Army Staff reported sighting a cylindrical UFO with bright lights near Fort Knox, Kentucky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes,The object was described as cylindrical and about 50 feet off the ground,It was traveling in a very slow and erratic course,The sighting was reported by military officers,The object was not classified as a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: officers from the Seventh Army Staff
